label: CT110
info_overview: The Z-Wave Plus enabled CT110 is a sleek, modern thermostat design for home automation systems. It’s clean user interface compliments app-enabled systems, and it connects to a Z-Wave network with one touch. The CT110 features adjustable real-time alerts to enable cloud triggers, a robust data stream of HVAC information for cloud monitoring, and configurable comfort response settings to customize home control scenes. The CT110 is compatible with all popular HVAC systems and is battery-operated without the need for a C-wire
info_inclusion: Press and hold the network button for 5 seconds.  The thermostat must be in OFF mode.
info_exclusion: Press and hold the network button for 5 seconds.  The thermostat must be in OFF mode.
info_wakeup: When included into a Z-Wave network on battery power, this device is a FLiRS device.  The Thermostat will wake up for communication when it receives a valid Z-Wave beam.

parameters.label: Save Energy Mode Type
parameters.overview:
1=Adjust by target delta,

2=Least consuming point in the running program,

3=Save energy absolute setpoint,

255=Save Energy not supported

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

notices: Endpoint 0 has no command class linked to the basic class.
Endpoint 1 has no command class linked to the basic class.
